Garrison Machinjili (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1963) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Chapungu Sculpture Park kemgbe afọ 1989, ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe, dịka Charles Backford na Benard Nkanjo
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụ anya, mana a na-esite na ihe okike
A mụrụ arrison Machinjili Garrison n'afọ 1963 na Mazoe, Zimbabwe

O nwere njikọ na ọgbọ nke abụọ nke onye Zimbabwe, Tapfuma Gutsa, ọ bụkwa n'oge nleta na Tapfuma ka e mere ka ọ mara ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume.
Garrison na Tapfuma rụkọrọ ọrụ n'afọ 1986
Na mbụ, ọ na-asa ma na-acha ihe ọkpụkpụ n'oge Mmecha nke Ikpeazụ ha

Mgbe e mesịrị, o mere ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ya, ma chọpụta ụdị onwe onye siri ike na-apụta n'oge mmalite a na-akpali akpali.
Ná ngwụsị afọ 1987, o guzobere aha ya dị ka talent ọhụrụ dị mkpa na nka Zimbabwe, a kpọkwara ya ka ọ sonye na Chapungu Sculpture Village dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ebe ọ nọgidere ruo afọ 1991 ma laghachi ọzọ n'afọ 1999–2000.
Ihe ngosi otu gụnyere: - "African Odyssey: 50 Years of Zimbabwean Stone Sculpture", OXO Gallery, London, UK (2006) - "Custom and Legend: A Culture In Stone", Kew Gardens, London, UK (2000) - Ngosipụta mmalite na Chapungu Gallery, Melbourne, Australia (1998) - Zuva Gallery, Scottsdale, Arizona, USA (1998
